verses.verse: So the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> "You and your <S%H1121>sons<s%> and your father's <S%H1004>household<s%> with you shall <S%H5375>bear<s%> the <S%H5771>guilt<s%> in connection with the <S%H4720>sanctuary;<s%> and you and your <S%H1121>sons<s%> with you shall <S%H5375>bear<s%> the <S%H5771>guilt<s%> in connection with your <S%H3550>priesthood.<s%>

"But <S%H7126>bring<s%> with you <S%H1571>also<s%> your <S%H251>brothers,<s%> the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H3878>Levi,<s%> the <S%H7626>tribe<s%> of your father, that they may be <S%H1>joined<s%> with you and <S%H3867>serve<s%> you, while you and your <S%H8334>sons<s%> with you are <S%H1121>before<s%> the <S%H6440>tent<s%> of the <S%H168>testimony.<s%>

"And they shall thus <S%H8104>attend<s%> to your <S%H4931>obligation<s%> and the <S%H4931>obligation<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H168>tent,<s%> but they shall not <S%H7126>come<s%> <S%H7126>near<s%> to the <S%H3627>furnishings<s%> of the <S%H6944>sanctuary<s%> and the <S%H4196>altar,<s%> <S%H3808>lest<s%> <S%H1571>both<s%> they and you <S%H4191>die.<s%>

"And they shall be <S%H3867>joined<s%> with you and <S%H8104>attend<s%> to the <S%H4931>obligations<s%> of the <S%H168>tent<s%> of <S%H4150>meeting,<s%> for <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5656>service<s%> of the <S%H168>tent;<s%> but an <S%H2114>outsider<s%> may not <S%H7126>come<s%> <S%H7126>near<s%> you.

"So you shall <S%H8104>attend<s%> to the <S%H4931>obligations<s%> of the <S%H6944>sanctuary<s%> and the <S%H4931>obligations<s%> of the <S%H4196>altar,<s%> that there may <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5750>longer<s%> be <S%H7110>wrath<s%> on the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

"And <S%H2009>behold,<s%> I <S%H589>Myself<s%> have <S%H3947>taken<s%> your <S%H251>fellow<s%> <S%H3881>Levites<s%> from <S%H8432>among<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> they are a <S%H4979>gift<s%> to you, <S%H5414>dedicated<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> to <S%H5647>perform<s%> the <S%H5656>service<s%> for the <S%H168>tent<s%> of <S%H4150>meeting.<s%>

"But you and your <S%H1121>sons<s%> with you shall <S%H8104>attend<s%> to your <S%H3550>priesthood<s%> for <S%H3605>everything<s%> <S%H1697>concerning<s%> the <S%H4196>altar<s%> and <S%H4480>inside<s%> <S%H1004><s%> the <S%H6532>veil,<s%> and you are to <S%H5647>perform<s%> <S%H5656>service.<s%> I am <S%H5414>giving<s%> you the <S%H3550>priesthood<s%> as a <S%H4979>bestowed<s%> <S%H5656>service,<s%> but the <S%H2114>outsider<s%> who <S%H7131>comes<s%> <S%H7131>near<s%> shall be <S%H4191>put<s%> to <S%H4191>death.<s%>"

Then the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> "Now <S%H2009>behold,<s%> I <S%H589>Myself<s%> have <S%H5414>given<s%> you <S%H4931>charge<s%> of My <S%H8641>offerings,<s%> even <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H6944>holy<s%> gifts of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> I have <S%H5414>given<s%> them to you as a <S%H9296>portion,<s%> and to your <S%H1121>sons<s%> as a <S%H5769>perpetual<s%> <S%H2706>allotment.<s%>

<S%H2088>"This<s%> shall be yours from the <S%H6944>most<s%> <S%H6944>holy<s%> [gifts, reserved] from the <S%H784>fire;<s%> <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H7133>offering<s%> of theirs, even <S%H3605>every<s%> grain <S%H4503>offering<s%> and <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H9128>sin<s%> <S%H9128>offering<s%> and <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H817>guilt<s%> <S%H817>offering,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> they shall <S%H7725>render<s%> to Me, shall be <S%H6944>most<s%> <S%H6944>holy<s%> for you and for your <S%H1121>sons.<s%>
"As the <S%H6944>most<s%> <S%H6944>holy<s%> [gifts] you shall <S%H398>eat<s%> it; <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H2145>male<s%> shall <S%H398>eat<s%> it. It shall be <S%H6944>holy<s%> to you.

<S%H2088>"This<s%> also is yours, the <S%H8641>offering<s%> of their <S%H4976>gift,<s%> even <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H8573>wave<s%> <S%H8573>offerings<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> I have <S%H5414>given<s%> them to you and to your <S%H1121>sons<s%> and <S%H1323>daughters<s%> with you, as a <S%H5769>perpetual<s%> <S%H2706>allotment.<s%> <S%H3605>Everyone<s%> of your <S%H1004>household<s%> who is <S%H2889>clean<s%> may <S%H398>eat<s%> it.

<S%H3605>"All<s%> the <S%H2459>best<s%> of the <S%H3323>fresh<s%> <S%H3323>oil<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H2459>best<s%> of the <S%H8492>fresh<s%> <S%H8492>wine<s%> and of the <S%H1715>grain,<s%> the <S%H7225>first<s%> <S%H7225>fruits<s%> of those <S%H834>which<s%> they <S%H5414>give<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> I <S%H5414>give<s%> them to you.

"The <S%H1061>first<s%> <S%H1061>ripe<s%> <S%H1061>fruits<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> that is in their <S%H776>land,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> they <S%H935>bring<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> shall be yours; <S%H3605>everyone<s%> of your <S%H1004>household<s%> who is <S%H2889>clean<s%> may <S%H398>eat<s%> it.
<S%H3605>"Every<s%> <S%H9172>devoted<s%> <S%H9172>thing<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel<s%> shall be yours.

<S%H3605>"Every<s%> <S%H6363>first<s%> <S%H6363>issue<s%> of the womb of <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H1320>flesh,<s%> whether <S%H120>man<s%> or <S%H929>animal,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> they <S%H7126>offer<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> shall be yours; <S%H389>nevertheless<s%> the first-born of <S%H120>man<s%> you shall <S%H6299>surely<s%> <S%H6299>redeem,<s%> and the first-born of <S%H2931>unclean<s%> <S%H929>animals<s%> you shall <S%H6299>redeem.<s%>

"And as to their <S%H6299>redemption<s%> <S%H6299>price,<s%> from a <S%H2320>month<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> you shall <S%H6299>redeem<s%> them, by your <S%H6187>valuation,<s%> <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H8255>shekels<s%> in <S%H3701>silver,<s%> according to the <S%H8255>shekel<s%> of the <S%H6944>sanctuary,<s%> <S%H1931>which<s%> is <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H1626>gerahs.<s%>

"But the first-born of an <S%H7794>ox<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> the first-born of a <S%H3775>sheep<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> the first-born of a <S%H5795>goat,<s%> you shall not <S%H6299>redeem;<s%> they are <S%H6944>holy.<s%> You shall <S%H2236>sprinkle<s%> their <S%H1818>blood<s%> on the <S%H4196>altar<s%> and shall <S%H6999>offer<s%> up their <S%H2459>fat<s%> in <S%H6999>smoke<s%> [as] an <S%H801>offering<s%> by <S%H801>fire,<s%> for a <S%H5207>soothing<s%> <S%H7381>aroma<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>
"And their <S%H1320>meat<s%> shall be yours; it shall be yours like the <S%H2373>breast<s%> of a <S%H8573>wave<s%> <S%H8573>offering<s%> and like the <S%H3225>right<s%> <S%H7785>thigh.<s%>

<S%H3605>"All<s%> the <S%H8641>offerings<s%> of the <S%H6944>holy<s%> [gifts,] <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H7311>offer<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> I have <S%H5414>given<s%> to you and your <S%H1121>sons<s%> and your <S%H1323>daughters<s%> with you, as a <S%H5769>perpetual<s%> <S%H2706>allotment.<s%> It is an <S%H5769>everlasting<s%> <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of <S%H4417>salt<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> to you and your <S%H2233>descendants<s%> with you."

Then the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> "You shall have <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5157>inheritance<s%> in their <S%H776>land,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H1961>own<s%> any <S%H2506>portion<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> them; I am your <S%H2506>portion<s%> and your <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

"And to the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3878>Levi,<s%> <S%H2009>behold,<s%> I have <S%H5414>given<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4643>tithe<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel<s%> for an <S%H5159>inheritance,<s%> in <S%H2500>return<s%> for their <S%H5656>service<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> they <S%H5647>perform,<s%> the <S%H5656>service<s%> of the <S%H168>tent<s%> of <S%H4150>meeting.<s%>

"And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> shall not <S%H7126>come<s%> <S%H7126>near<s%> the <S%H168>tent<s%> of <S%H4150>meeting<s%> <S%H5750>again,<s%> lest they <S%H5375>bear<s%> <S%H2399>sin<s%> and <S%H4191>die.<s%>

"Only the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> shall <S%H5647>perform<s%> the <S%H5656>service<s%> of the <S%H168>tent<s%> of <S%H4150>meeting,<s%> and they shall <S%H5375>bear<s%> their <S%H5771>iniquity;<s%> it shall be a <S%H5769>perpetual<s%> <S%H2708>statute<s%> throughout your <S%H1755>generations,<s%> and <S%H8432>among<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> they shall <S%H5157>have<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5159>inheritance.<s%>

"For the <S%H4643>tithe<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> they <S%H7311>offer<s%> as an <S%H8641>offering<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> I have <S%H5414>given<s%> to the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> for an <S%H5159>inheritance;<s%> <S%H5921>therefore<s%> <S%H3651><s%> I have <S%H559>said<s%> concerning them, 'They shall <S%H5157>have<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>'"
Then the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

"Moreover, you shall <S%H1696>speak<s%> to the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> and <S%H559>say<s%> to them, <S%H3588>'When<s%> you <S%H3947>take<s%> from the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> the <S%H4643>tithe<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I have <S%H5414>given<s%> you from them for your <S%H5159>inheritance,<s%> then you shall <S%H7311>present<s%> an <S%H8641>offering<s%> from it to the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> a <S%H4643>tithe<s%> of the <S%H4643>tithe.<s%>

'And your <S%H8641>offering<s%> shall be <S%H2803>reckoned<s%> to you as the <S%H1715>grain<s%> from the <S%H1637>threshing<s%> <S%H1637>floor<s%> or the <S%H4395>full<s%> <S%H4395>produce<s%> from the <S%H3342>wine<s%> <S%H3342>vat.<s%>

<S%H3651>'So<s%> you shall <S%H1571>also<s%> <S%H7311>present<s%> an <S%H8641>offering<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> from your <S%H4643>tithes,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> you <S%H3947>receive<s%> from the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> and from it you shall <S%H5414>give<s%> the Lord's <S%H8641>offering<s%> to <S%H175>Aaron<s%> the <S%H3548>priest.<s%>

'Out of <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H4979>gifts<s%> you shall <S%H7311>present<s%> <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H8641>offering<s%> due to the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> from <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H2459>best<s%> of them, the <S%H4720>sacred<s%> <S%H4720>part<s%> from them.'

"And you shall <S%H559>say<s%> to them, 'When you have <S%H7311>offered<s%> from it the <S%H2459>best<s%> of it, then [the rest] shall be <S%H2803>reckoned<s%> to the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> as the <S%H8393>product<s%> of the <S%H1637>threshing<s%> <S%H1637>floor,<s%> and as the <S%H8393>product<s%> of the <S%H3342>wine<s%> <S%H3342>vat.<s%>

'And you may <S%H398>eat<s%> it <S%H3605>anywhere,<s%> <S%H4725><s%> you and your <S%H1004>households,<s%> for it is your <S%H7939>compensation<s%> in <S%H2500>return<s%> for your <S%H5656>service<s%> in the <S%H168>tent<s%> of <S%H4150>meeting.<s%>

'And you shall <S%H5375>bear<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H2399>sin<s%> by <S%H5921>reason<s%> of it, when you have <S%H7311>offered<s%> the <S%H2459>best<s%> of it. But you shall not <S%H2490>profane<s%> the <S%H6944>sacred<s%> <S%H6944>gifts<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H3808>lest<s%> you <S%H4191>die.<s%>' "
